decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (A-10-02_E Rev. P1, Unnumbered montage, A-00-02 Rev. P1, Unnumbered image of cladding material received: 26 August 2016 A-10-01 Rev. P1 Received: 02 September 2016 P-000 Rev. 0 Received: 25 October 2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - Prior to occupation of the development, details of the proposed cycle parking including the shelter/cover shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The cycle parking shelter/cover shall be implemented and permanently maintained thereafter

Condition : 4 - Notwithstanding the provision of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development Order) 2015 (or any order revoking or re-enacting that order), the premises shall be used for a B1a use class and for no other purpose (including any change of use to residential via the prior approval process).
description: Erection of a single storey side extension to the existing building
